comment._content: I think these may be in Tanzania rather than Malawi

comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: I agree. The names aren't familiar and a couple of photos ago there was a picture of  Lake Tanganyika.

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: Kawimbe is in Zambia, between Mbala (Abercorn) and the bouindary with Tanzania.

comment.author: 73493782@N08
comment._content:
Kawimbe, where I was born in July 1940, is definitely in Zambia.   My father, Richard Henry Sabin was Missionary there and at Mbereshi, in Kawambwa District, 200 miles to the west of Kawimbe, from 1932 -1940, when we moved down to Cape Town for nearly four years, prior to repatriating to the UK in 1944.
Christopher H H Sabin 
3rd Jan 2012
